column4: ok  I have someone going to pick up a wireless keyboard, mouse and webcam and I am going to buy the web cam off them but it is a M$, will it play nice with ubuntu?
yeah ive seen lots of logitech ones work but will a microsoft one works as it is not in the list
best bet. google  for  the webcam model and linux.  others must have tried making it work with linux. see if it does

http://www.colinbaker.org/unix/microsoftwebcam http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=555172 http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4162010#post4162010  use google!   short answer: it's not worth it in 7.10. maybe 8.04 will be better.
